Title: A La Carte
Writer: Louis C.K. (created by), Louis C.K. (story by), Louis C.K. (teleplay by), Pamela Adlon (story by)
Actors: Louis C.K., Hadley Delany, Ursula Parker, Pamela Adlon
Plot: An urgent matter cuts Louie's grocery trip short. Louie gives some frank advice to a struggling amateur during Open Mic Night. Pamela and Louie try to set the parameters of their relationship.
